name: Project J.S. (TV Game Jam Prototype)
description:
Jean tries to remove a mustard stain from his couch.

This prototype was made in two weeks. It's small and only has four rooms to explore.

Use the Arrow Keys to move and "A" to interact with objects such as the refrigerator or couch. In battle, press the Up or Down Arrow Keys to move the cursor, Left to  go back, and "A" to select.
